= Installation =

*1.* Unpak patches in root folder of your Joomla site.

*_JС43 Patch Joomla1.5._ for JCapthca 4.3.0*

*2.* Install the plugin.

*_JС43 Installation JCaptha 4.3.0*

(If upgrade from previous versions just unpack *_JС43 Upgrade Patch from Joomla Captha 4.0 to Joomla Captha 4.3.0* in root folder of your Joomla site.)

*3.* Save plugin parameters.

[http://groups.google.com/group/joomlacaptcha/web/joomla-captcha-parameters See how to setup parameters there...]

*
{{{
Adm.panel - > Extentions -> Plugin Manager -> System - Captcha -> Save btn
}}}
*

*4.* Enjoy.
